abstract: Six Denver sheriff’s deputies are put on restricted duty while authorities investigate events leading up to death of inmate Michael Marshal.
lead_paragraph: Six Denver sheriff’s deputies are on restricted duty while the authorities investigate an episode at the downtown jail involving an inmate who later died.

headline.main: Colorado: Deputies on Restricted Duty After Jail Death
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Deputies on Restricted Duty After Jail Death

snippet: Six Denver sheriff’s deputies are on restricted duty while the authorities investigate an episode at the downtown jail involving an inmate who later died.
